sentences.en: "Here's fresh meat for your axe, Kreis, " he said; "a rose-white youth with the ardor of a lover for Herbert Spencer.
sentences.cn: “克瑞斯，你那板斧有了新对象了，”他说，“一个纯洁得像白玫瑰的青年，对斯宾塞怀着恋人一样的热情。

sentences.en: ARDOR, n. The quality that distinguishes love without knowledge.
sentences.cn: 热爱: 区分为无知的爱.

sentences.en: Cathy Whitaker: That was the day I stopped believing in the wild ardor of things.
sentences.cn: 凯西。惠特克：那一天，让我开始不再相信狂野的热情这样的事情。

sentences.en: Come to me, you, who desire me with ardor.
sentences.cn: 到我这里来, 你们那些以热情渴求我的.

sentences.en: He shows great ardor for fame [ victory ].
sentences.cn: 他对名誉 [ 胜利 ] 表示出热切的渴望.

sentences.en: He took up his pursuit with ardor.
sentences.cn: 他满腔热忱地从事工作.

sentences.en: His ardor was contagious; soon everyone was eagerly working.
sentences.cn: 他的热情很有感染力, 一下子大家都热火朝天地干了起来.

sentences.en: His political ardor led him into many arguments.
sentences.cn: 他的政治狂热使他多次卷入争论中.

sentences.en: It has not cooled his ardor in the cause of the people.
sentences.cn: 这并未使他献身于人民的事业的热忱冷却下来.

sentences.en: It's strongly opposed by all the people who ardor peace.
sentences.cn: 这是被世界上热爱和平的人强烈反对的.

sentences.en: She displayed great ardor for art.
sentences.cn: 她对艺术表现出极大的热心.

sentences.en: Stand of full of youthful spirity , warm, ardor and riches and honour.
sentences.cn: 象征朝气蓬勃 、 温暖 、 热情、富贵.

sentences.en: The difficulty and failure both didn't cool his ardor.
sentences.cn: 困难和失败都没有降低他的热情。

sentences.en: They evoke no ardor in the male breast.
sentences.cn: 它激不起男人胸中的热情.

sentences.en: Throw your soul's fresh , glowing ardor, into the battle for truth.
sentences.cn: 孤注一掷热情蓬勃, 勇敢赴真理战场!

sentences.en: Tongue - tied by inexperience by excess of ardor, wooing unwittinglyawkwardly, Martin continued contact.
sentences.cn: 缺乏经验,也过分热情, 马丁说不出后来.

sentences.en: Yet the ardor for inflation never dies.
sentences.cn: 然而,人们对通货膨胀的热情从未消退过.
